content: **about ** the rosemary bag features a delicate lace pattern and long i-cord straps this lightweight small bag is perfect for carrying just the essentials such as your phone and keys it is knitted in the round following a chart with the straps picked up and worked in the next step finally a lining is added for extra stability and structure a chart can be found at the end of the pattern **gauge ** 22 row x 30 row = 10 x 10 cm in pattern stitch **recommended needles ** 3 5 mm circular needles 60 or 80 cm long 3 5 mm double pointed needles **yarn ** about 40g of sandnes garn line or any other yarn that fits the gauge **additional material ** lining sewing needle thread this design is part of a growing collection of slow intentional knits you may also enjoy the rosemary vest and rosemary vest mini https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/rosemary-vest https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/rosemary-vest-mini
